metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48554 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
File before 5.43 has an stack-based buffer over-read in file_copystr in funcs.c. NOTE: "File" is the name of an Open Source project.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48554` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

file - 1:5.41-3ubuntu0.1
libmagic-mgc - 1:5.41-3ubuntu0.1
libmagic1 - 1:5.41-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: file package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:5.41-3ubuntu0.1').
